This is a short codebook for the 81 variables in the data set

Subject: This pertains to the person whose measurements were taken, there are 30 subjects in total
Activity: This pertains to the six different activities that could have taken place
        1 WALKING
        2 WALKING_UPSTAIRS
        3 WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS
        4 SITTING
        5 STANDING
        6 LAYING

The rest of the variables are the means for the different measurements taken.
